resources.string: "Choose the length of the result to be displayed (WARNING: if you set this to a number above 500, performance might suffer!)"
"Choose whether to calculate with degrees or radians"
"Rate this app! It helps us a lot to keep the updates coming."
"Please download the donation version of this app in the playstore if you can spare a buck."
Graph is a simple program that evaluates a mathmatical expression an draws is to a graph.
This app would not be possible without:
expr library used to transcribe math expressions by github user Darius:

Graph understands most math functions.

A few simple guidlines:

Use the variable 'x'
When multiplying a constant by the variable (2x) 
	use the * symbol (2*x)
Higher functions like exponents (^), pi, sin etc. work
For trig functions use the syntax sin(pi/4*x) or 
	cos(x)
